website_summaries.verdict: For those who are into progressive design, Climacool 1 of Adidas is certainly worth looking up. The shoe’s totally original aesthetics as well as its signature side panel ventilation unit, are sure head-turners.This sneaker is also a great option for those who want their feet to stay cool and smelling fresh, especially during the warm summer months. The shoe promises a one-of-a-kind cooling experience for the entire foot with its 360-degree Climacool technology.
pros: Most of the reviewers declare the Adidas Climacool 1 as a very comfortable shoe
A great number of users appreciate the sneaker’s stylish, good looks
Many have reported that the shoe is lightweight that feels like walking on air
The sneaker provides good support, a few have commented
“Airy,” “breathable,” “supremely ventilated,” are some of the words several users used to describe the Adidas Climacool 1
The shoe provides a perfect fit, a good number of reviewers have noted
The Adidas Climacool 1 performs well in a wide range of activities
A few have reported that the shoe is durable, practical and reliable
A handful are glad the sneaker has been reissued, as they had been fans of the original Climacool
cons: A few dislike the amount of plastic material used, saying it was unnecessary and causes discomfort
The Adidas Climacool 1  is slightly stiff the first few wears, a couple of users have noticed
The plastic on the heel area rubs on heel, causing soreness and even blisters, a couple have noted

customer_reviews.title: Durability quality test time commences
customer_reviews.text: Not worn them out yet but the closest I will get to the original Climacool design. I hope the quality will be as good and that they last the fifteen years the original ones have. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Cleo079045

customer_reviews.title: I like them.
customer_reviews.text: The are very comfortable. They’re men shoes l am a lady l could wear them for hours without pain. The look lovely l love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tariro Black

customer_reviews.title: Climacoooool
customer_reviews.text: Owned some of the original Climacool's back in the 90's and I'm a big fan. I mean, where can you go wrong? Adidas Trainers where the stripes are vertical instead of those new Adidas monstrosities with horizontal stripes! Now own 2 pairs of these in black and white and will be adding to the collection if see any more at such a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Genuine item as described
customer_reviews.text: Used to use eBay but had to many fakes etc..glad moved to amazon the trainers are the proper thing comfy and fit like supposed to and the seller was fast to despatch and keep me informed thanks
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Adidas - can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Really quick delivery. Love these trainers and at a really good price. Avid Adidas trainer wearer
customer_reviews.author: Allen Harris

customer_reviews.title: price pretty much same everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day early, price pretty much same everywhere, great fit and light on feet
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came up way to small and didn't have the Adidas logo on the back of the trainers
customer_reviews.author: Aisling Pryce Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers although I found I had to go at ...
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers although I found I had to go at least one size bigger than usual. These are a particularly narrow fit but when sized correctly provide a great deal of support. Because of their "Clima Cool" design, you can really feel the breezes cooling effect.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great but order half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: The trainers are great but they are a small size 9, I’ve given them to my son and will probably order a 9.5.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Go a full size up
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 9 ,after reading the reviews , I ordered a size 9.5 . I should have ordered a size 10 as 9.5 still cramps my toes .
customer_reviews.author: vincent gaskell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looki looking but maybe not as comfy as I thought but still good trainers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good seller
customer_reviews.text: Very tight at first but once broke in they are great.not for wet weather but look great on
customer_reviews.author: Emma b.

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Nice good quality shoes. Fits true to size, and came in good conditon box.
customer_reviews.author: Samirahmed

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Love these trainers - great in the full black - special editions.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mehigan

customer_reviews.title: Sole came off
customer_reviews.text: Part of he sole came off within first week of wearing these
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Eckley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes but it was a little bit small on me
customer_reviews.author: elphy sunga

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, just like my 10 year old ones I still use for work...but obviously a little worn lol...
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Fragile. Nice to look at but don’t play sport in them!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking comfy trainers but unfortunately very fragile. The sole peeled of within weeks. They were used for football on a hard surface which may be the problem but I’ve never had trainers that fell apart like this before so I have to give the low mark.
customer_reviews.author: Smocker

customer_reviews.title: GREAT! **BUT DEFINITELY SIZE UP! (they are small!)
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these trainers - and they are surprisingly durable despite being very lightweight and ventilated. So comfy. So light. My third pair - nothing comes close!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable, I was so pleased with these after using ...
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, I was so pleased with these after using some zx flux that I ordered another pair in blue.
customer_reviews.author: R7000

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for summer
customer_reviews.text: These adidas climacool shoes are amazing I got these for myself and these shoes fit well and overall are very good quality they feel nice the soles are not too stiff and not too squishy they are really good for the summer and keep your feet rather cool but I would not recommend for rainy or cold weather as they have holes tiny holes for air to flow threw in the summer and your feet get soaked trust me I know If I lost These shoes today would I go out and get another pair the answer is yes 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mr K Moss

customer_reviews.title: Slippery When Wet!
customer_reviews.text: These are very lightweight, look nice and while a little stiff in the beginning they soften nicely. The major downside of these is that if there is a tiny bit of damp or wet on a floor they are ice skates! Utterly no grip at all once there is the slightest hint of moisture, so just be very careful!
customer_reviews.author: Harriet

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Proper Adidas despite what another customer wrote. Legit climactic. Super comfy and fast delivery! Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably happy
customer_reviews.text: Quite rigid and has very short laces. Great delivery service.
customer_reviews.author: goldenlasoo

customer_reviews.title: The top of the shoes is a bit tight
customer_reviews.text: Good. The top of the shoes is a bit tight when I first try it. After few days it is fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: tthanh0811

product_meta.title: adidas Climacool 1, Men's Trainers
product_meta.description: Lightweight, run inspired shoe with a sporty appearance. Featuring synthetic Suede overlays and a mesh upper, This allows for enhanced breathability. Official Merchandise.
